snippet: The protective cases from Gizmon leave no doubt as to what your favorite iPhone feature is. The case makes your phone look like a vintage Leica and adds camera features to your phone.
abstract: The protective cases from Gizmon leave no doubt as to what your favorite iPhone feature is. The case makes your phone look like a vintage Leica and adds camera features to your phone.

headline.main: An iPhone Case With a Focus on Photos
headline.print_headline: For a Camera Phone, a Case That Looks the Part
